and t.position_sid = #{positionSid} and t.position_code like concat('%', #{positionCode}, '%')
and t3.nick_name like concat('%', #{creatorAccount}, '%')
and (t.position_name like concat('%', #{item}, '%'))
and t.handle_status = #{handleStatus}
and t.handle_status in (#{handleStatus})
and t.company_sid = #{companySid}
and t.company_sid in (#{companySid})

mapper.sql: SELECT t.client_id, t.position_sid, t.position_code, t.position_name, t.company_sid, t.position_duty, t.remark, t.disable_remark, t.STATUS, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t.remark, t.serial_num, t2.company_name, t2.short_name as company_short_name, t3.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t4.nick_name AS updater_account_name, t5.nick_name AS confirmer_account_name FROM s_bas_position t LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t2 ON t.company_sid = t2.company_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t3 on t.creator_account = t3.user_name LEFT JOIN sys_user t4 on t.updater_account = t4.user_name LEFT JOIN sys_user t5 on t.confirmer_account = t5.user_name
